title: Project Manager
role: Project Management, Information Technology, and Marketing
description: My client is a Web3-native start-up focused on acquiring and producing IP across the NFT ecosystem. They are seeking a dynamic and passionate Project Manager to foster meaningful connections, drive engagement, and cultivate a vibrant community within their ecosystemThe Role:As the Project Manager for their strategic initiatives, you will play a pivotal role in ensuring the successful execution of their creative projects while maintaining operational excellence. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams, manage vendor relationships, and drive project execution that enhances their brand identity and community engagement.Responsibilities:● Actively engage with the Web3 and NFT community to stay up to date on industry trends and technologies.● Collaborate with the internal team to build token utility, enhancing user engagement and incentivizing participation to meet project initiatives.● Identify, scope, budget, and manage relationships with external agencies and technical development partners across the web3 ecosystem.● Manage all aspects IRL activation logistics, ensuring exceptional event execution and resource alignment.● Develop and monitor comprehensive project budgets.● Monitor project timelines for on-time and on-budget completion.● Oversee squad KPIs and track creative impact on strategic objectives.● Implement efficient workflows for the creative team; identify and unblock bottlenecks for improved processes.● Organize post-project reviews that proactively address challenges, needed refinements, and lessons learned to build operational excellence.● Manage Shopify store for project merch; implement automated workflows for order processing, distribution, tracking, and communication.● Identify strategic and creative opportunities to elevate the Metaversal brand.Requirements:● Bachelor’s degree.● 3 years of experience in project management, preferably in web3, blockchain, crypto, or NFTs, with knowledge of the major players within the field.● Proven track record of successfully managing complex creative projects and campaigns.● Strong organizational skills with a keen attention to detail.● Exceptional written and verbal communication skills.● Proficient in project management software and tools such as Asana, Notion, and Trello.● Ability to build frameworks and processes from scratch for a fast-paced, dynamic startup.● Strong creative problem-solving abilities.● Passion about understanding web3 culture and emerging technologies.
